message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price! I think you'll really love it.
I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $90?
I understand you're on a budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $95?
I'm not willing to go as low as $95, but I can offer it to you for $105, which is the lowest I'm willing to go.
I'm not sure I can go as high as $105. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $99?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to make a deal. I can offer it to you for $105 is too high, but I can offer it to you for $102.50, which is the best I can do.
I really like the product, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $100?
